definition: to become a Buddha/to attain enlightenment
surname Cheng
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
Buddha/Buddhism
to become a Buddha on the spot (idiom); instant rehabilitation/to repent and be absolved of one's crimes
lay down butcher's knife, become a Buddha on the spot (idiom); instant rehabilitation/to repent and be absolved of one's crimes
pinyin: fang4 xia4 tu2 dao1 , li4 di4 cheng2 fo2

sentences.english: If you have not broken samaya, you will become Buddha eventually.
sentences.chinese: 你若未破三昧耶，你終將成佛。

sentences.english: Only by realizing sagehood and becoming a Buddha can we find true happiness.
sentences.chinese: 證果成佛，這纔是真正的快樂。

sentences.english: And it is primarily because of this merit that Devadatta will also become a Buddha in the future.
sentences.chinese: 提婆達多因爲這樣的功德，將來也會成佛的。

sentences.english: One is the ultimate ideal, the highest objective-attainment of Buddhahood.
sentences.chinese: 一方面是究竟理想，最崇高目的是成佛。

sentences.english: He even vowed to take across people who slandered him so that they would accomplish Buddhahood before he did.
sentences.chinese: 甚至誓願度一切詆譭辱罵他的人比自己更早成佛。

sentences.english: Therefore, only when we attain Buddhahood, can we perfectly help all beings in the universe.
sentences.chinese: 因此，一定要成佛道，才能夠廣度九法界一切衆生。

sentences.english: Being evil does not lead to Buddhahood; it only hampers it.
sentences.chinese: 爲惡不能成佛，而是相反。

sentences.english: Let the customers be Buddha at once.
Spiritual cultivation is for attaining Buddhahood.
sentences.chinese: 每個人修行不就是爲了成佛？

sentences.english: This applies all the more so to our Buddhist practice, which constitutes training for becoming a Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 更何況，佛道修行本就是爲了成佛而有的鍛鍊。

sentences.english: People who cultivates with this method may obtain a rainbow body without death, finally obtain Buddhahood.
sentences.chinese: 修持此空行母法，能得無死虹身，畢竟成佛。

sentences.english: And, Shariputra, since Amitabha realized Buddhahood, ten kalpas have passed.
sentences.chinese: 舍利弗，阿彌陀佛成佛以來，於今十劫。

sentences.english: A butcher can become a Buddha after laying down the knife.
sentences.chinese: 宰殺豬羊的屠夫，因放下屠刀，立地成佛。

sentences.english: They are not attached to the fruits of karma, and are but one step from Buddhahood.
sentences.chinese: 他們不附上因果報應的果實，而只是成佛的一個臺階。

sentences.english: After six years of strict discipline, he finally realized his dream of full enlightenment on the eighth day of the twelfth lunar month.
sentences.chinese: 後經六年苦行，終於在臘月初八這一天悟道成佛。

sentences.english: This vow was accomplished when he achieved enlightenment as the Amitabha Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 他的誓願得以實現是在他證菩提而成佛時。
